name: Dawn Break II -Light and Dark
description:
Become Heroes, fight your way out of lights and darks!

A extended story of《Dawn Break: The Flaming Emperor》!
Vampire - Simon and Naughty Princess - Luna are running a quest house in the kingdom of Goz. In order to reclaim the ring of the queen stolen by the arch thief, and discover a scheme that includes all the royals......!? Only you can solve the puzzle and reveal the true evil within!

====FEATURES====

◆Master Elements to take down powerful enemies! 3 Heroes in battle simultaneously!

◆Simplified equipment collect and cultivate, more fined story lines and battle trainings!

◆Awake! Burst the ultimate power of your Heroes! Enjoy the cinematic graphics of your smooth battles!

◆Cute Fairies accompany on your way, help you in battle and can be send to quests!

◆Whole new comic UI, immerse you into the story even further!

Notice：
1. The subscription will be extended automatically each month.
2. A cancellation of the membership will be activated next month
3. The service will be automatically extended and charged if not cancel within 24 hr before it expires.
4. You can use 【Subscribtion】 of your device to manage membership subscription, a cancellation of the membership will be activated next month, and cannot be re-subscribed in the same month.
5. Service Term：http://www.auer.com.tw/terms_of_use.jsp?lang=en-us
